entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Wednesday 12 April 2023
